tool_description: Do you live for the Powerball? Well, you've just found your match! Get the latest winning numbers and statistics for your game!
name: Powerball
title: Powerball

api_list.name: Check Ticket
api_list.description: Let's see if you're ticket is a winner! This endpoint checks a set of 6 numbers to determine if there is a prize and if so, what is the prize level.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://powerball.p.rapidapi.com/CheckTicket/2022-11-14/19/35/53/56/67/21"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://powerball.p.rapidapi.com/CheckTicket/{date}/{firstnumber}/{secondnumber}/{thirdnumber}/{fourthnumber}/{fifthnumber}/{powerball}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest Drawing
api_list.description: Get the latest, and last winning Powerball winning number set.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

api_list.name: Drawings Between Dates
api_list.description: Get all Powerball winning number sets between two specified dates where the first number supplied is the beginning date and the second number supplied is the end date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://powerball.p.rapidapi.com/BetweenDates/01-01-2022/05-01-2022"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://powerball.p.rapidapi.com/BetweenDates/{date1}/{date2}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Drawing by Date
api_list.description: Get the winning Powerball number set from a specific drawing date.

api_list.name: Random QuickPick for Play
api_list.description: Get a randomized Quick Pick for the  Powerball. This is a random set of playable Powerball numbers.

api_list.name: General Statistics
api_list.description: This endpoint pulls basic statistics of the Powerball numbers. For each ball (denoted firstNumber, secondNumber, thirdNumber, fourthNumber, fifthNumber, powerBall, multiplier) of the mean, median, mode, and standard deviation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://powerball.p.rapidapi.com/stats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
